Ironman#
2007-09-10 00:00:00 -0700

So excited, and I just can't hide it.

The Merchant of Death. Awesome. Check out the trailer page, and the Ironman wikipedia page. So a few comments on this film trailer. First, I think the Robert Downey Jr. was a great choice for the role, at least it seems so in this trailer. I'm hoping that he can play the cocky bastard / genius / superhero role well. It looks like he definitely has Stark's pre-Ironman image down pat. On top of this, it seems like the suit does a great job looking like the Iroman costume from the modern comic books, such as Civil War.Finally I am happy that the movie is located all in California, even though the comic is based in New York. Why? Because California doesn't get enough love from Marvel :p

Hasta,
/Nat
